item.title: Conducting Effective Negotiations
item.description:
Conducting Effective Negotiations

Introduction

This session delves into the art of conducting effective negotiations. The instructor, emphasizing that negotiation is an essential but often disliked aspect of business, encourages participants to explore their feelings and experiences. The session aims to demystify negotiation and equip participants with insights to navigate challenging situations.

Negotiation Preferences

item.title: How to Speak: Notes on Presentation Techniques
item.description:
Based on How to Speak by MIT OpenCourseWare Also check out this talk by Nicky Case on How to Talk and Listen

How to Speak

Introduction:

The speaker starts by emphasizing the importance of communication skills for success in life. They highlight that knowledge, practice, and talent contribute to effective communication, but knowledge is paramount. The speaker promises to share techniques that can improve presentation skills, and outlines a rule of engagement â€“ no laptops or cell phones during the talk.
